berlin
Class Infos

java.lang.Object
  berlin.Infos

public class Infos
extends java.lang.Object

Contains general informations about the game. Contains useful information like the current turn and the number of players.

getTimeLimitPerTurn

public int getTimeLimitPerTurn()
Get the maximum time allowed by your AI to respond to a Berlin's request. Attention: this time include the latency (ping) on the network!

Returns:
the maximum time allowed by your AI to respond to a Berlin's request.
